Sameer Chitley

About

Hi! My name is Sameer Chitley, and I’m a senior Software Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. I’ve also interned as a software engineer at various companies including Yelp, Facebook, and Square.

I’ll be using this blog to outline, highlight, and discuss cool stuff. Whether it be things I build for school, locations I visit for work, or fascinating random encounters in the wild, I hope you have as much fun reading this blog as I have writing it

Thanks to Rohan Chandra’s Type Theme for Jekyll for helping build and style this blog!

Made with in Waterloo, Canada
